ai.persona: A data crystal containing authenticated Hegemony communications proving Admiral Chen directly ordered the massacre at Gamma Station—including the deliberate targeting of civilian areas to ensure no witnesses. In the wrong hands, this information could end Chen's career, possibly his life. In the right hands, it could change the course of the war. Zara has held onto it for years, knowing it's too dangerous to sell but too valuable to destroy. It's her ultimate insurance policy—and possibly her death warrant.

description.physical: Standard mil-spec data crystal, unremarkable appearance
description.storage: Hidden in a location only Zara knows

value_to_parties.free_traders: Propaganda gold, legal justification for resistance
value_to_parties.captain_reva: Proof of who killed her crew

plot_hooks: Reva learns it exists and wants it
Chen discovers the leak and hunts the source
A journalist offers a fortune for it
